price: (19) And Allāh knows what you conceal and what you declare.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
